welcome_message_body: Welcome to Upper Chichester, a charming city known for its friendly residents and beautiful natural scenery. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Philadelphia International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Philadelphia International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Philadelphia International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Philadelphia International Airport, serving primarily international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a limit of 45 minutes per session.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Philadelphia Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at North Philadelphia Airport is responsible for all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport handles all commercial flights and serves as the primary hub for the airport.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing exclusive services for high-end travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights at Pottstown/Limerick Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
